TopicTitle: Problem with KSOS car is driving in circles

Articles.Content:
So,recently Ive downloaded the mod KSOS to have some vehicles and stuff.But first my cars werent driving so I googled the problem and solved it.But now my cars are driving in cricles xD I mean that If I press W or S the car just drives a big circle with its front wheels.This is really annoying and I just want to drive a bit around the KSC.I hope someone can help me

Edited February 23, 2020 by Alexleel
